title: Gluten free bread for breadmaker
ingredients: ['3 eggs, beaten with 4 tablespoons water until frothy', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon agave nectar', '1/2 teaspoon rice vinegar', '300ml warm water', '200g sorghum flour', '125g tapioca starch', '100g millet flour', '80g brown rice flour', '65g potato starch', '3 teaspoons xanthan gum', '1 1/4 teaspoons salt', '2 1/4 teaspoons dried active yeast']
